channel.title: A Reaction to Black Mesa Release
channel.description:
A few days ago I made a reaction video to Black Mesa's official release. I think this properly gets my emotion across.
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CLulw71ayog&feature=plcp]Casual Reaction to Black Mesa[/url]
On a less silly side, how did you all react to Black Mesa's release?

item.title: A Reaction to Black Mesa Release
item.dc:creator: lordkameron
item.description:
GravityGun:

OMG I actually found that really funny ! Liked and added to favorites.

Really! Thanks a ton!
I think I might make more of these then.

Read full topic
item.source: A Reaction to Black Mesa Release
